dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: You will now be left on your own to kill some slimes without any hints.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: For this level, you will have infinite spray paint.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: However, when you leave the tutorial, your spray paint levels will be limited and you will have to manage it.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: Still, there will be refills, and they respawn off-screen, so you should be good.
